titles.title: To provide that claims presented to an Indian Health Service contracting officer pursuant to the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act on or before October 31, 2005, involving claims that accrued after October 1, 1995 and on or before September 30, 1999, shall be deemed timely presented.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee Indian and Alaska Native Affairs.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 2/14/2012--Introduced. Deems claims presented to an Indian Health Service contracting officer pursuant to the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act on or before October 31, 2005, involving claims that accrued after October 1, 1995, and on or before September 30, 1999, to have been timely presented.
